description: Valid values for properties with constrained value sets. Used during refinement to show exact valid values.

name.description: Valid cell type names - use exact spelling and capitalization
name.note: Case-sensitive. Use exact spelling as shown.
MUST be lowercase. Do NOT use 'T1D', 'Type 1 Diabetes', or any other variant.

UpOrDownRegulation.note: Lowercase only. 'up' means upregulated, 'down' means downregulated.
